EncoderMountingUser.Entry: Motor.Default.EncoderMounting.Angle.Type := mcMSMDEMA_USRDEF; // Encoder mounting is user defined

EncoderMountingUndefined.Entry: Motor.Default.EncoderMounting.Angle.Type := mcMSMDEMA_UDEF; // Encoder mounting is undefined

BrakeVoltageControlled.Entry: Brake.Used.ControlMode.Type := mcMSBUCM_V_CTRL; // Brake voltage control mode
